ISSUE.TITLE: No globalization support in aspnetcore-runtime-alpine
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.20 beta Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Deploy to docker in 2.2-aspnetcore-runtime-alpine 2. Install site 3. Check products on start page and notice the dollar signs on product prices are all invariant aspnetcore-runtime-alpine does not come with support for globalization thus fallbacking to the invariant culture. This is done to reduce dependencies and the size of the image. It leads to InvariantCulture beeing the one and only CultureInfo and causes lots of weird behaviour. ![nop_invariant](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1703885/57451510-c68c7a00-7261-11e9-83ba-200084c04557.jpg)
